mapper.insert: insert into meeting_absence(id, user_id, name, meeting_absence_time, meeting_absence_reason, meeting_absence_status, create_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{userId}, #{name}, #{meetingAbsenceTime}, #{meetingAbsenceReason}, #{meetingAbsenceStatus}, #{createTime})
mapper.select:
select id,name, meeting_absence_time, meeting_absence_reason, meeting_absence_status from meeting_absence
and name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
